name: portfolioupdate
description:
My portfolio consists of three sections:
  1. An about me page.
  2. A portfolio of a few sample projects that I've developed independently or as part of a larger group. The portfolio has links to the live websites and to the code. The projects include:

    3. a. Ven-You: An online event planner.

    b. Train scheduler.

    c. Crystal Collector.

    d. Trivia Game.

    e. Friend Finder.

    f. Burger Game.

  3. A contact me form.
